name: European Federation of National Associations of Water Services
goal:
It is EurEau’s mission to promote the common interests of its members to the EU institutions and to keep its members informed of relevant developments in the European arena.

In practice this results in the following main activities:

• To promote the common interests of the European water service sector to the EU institutions and stakeholders;
• To enable its members to adequately deal with opportunities and threats arising from EU policy and its national implementation;
• To support members’ networking.

In line with this, EurEau aims for a provision of reliable and high quality water supply and waste water services which:

• Protect public health;
• Fully respect the natural environment;
• Support economic development;
• Remain socially acceptable.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Borders and Security, Climate Action, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Foreign affairs and security policy, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market
